example.name: layer-xchord
example.description: Demonstration of how to encode notes of chords which occur on two different staves. Example from Mozart's piano sonata no. 1 in C major, K1 279, mvmt 2: Andante.

file.name: xchord.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: xchord.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
